The game is a tried and true first person competitive shooter. Counter strike has been a dominant expression of the fps shooter genre since the early 2000s. From humble beginnings as a niche title, the game has evolved into a modern day baseball analogue for the online gaming scene, one of the first real eSports. 

You plant bombs on stuff. You diffuse bombs on stuff. You shoot the guns you like at the people that you don't (sometimes that means friendly fire) but most importantly you click on heads and occasionally hit them. It's good stuff. 8.9/10 game, would play again, will play more.
Gran juego, gran jugabilidad, muy entretenido para jugar en equipo.
the game is tactical and fun to play with friends

This is an amazing FPS game that I highly recommend, it takes many hours to become simply decent at the game, but its really fun at the same time. Once you get a grip its countless hours of fun. Once you get to the ranked section of the game, there is a whole new side to the game (It can sometimes get really toxic though).
